name: Caustic Blood
components: V, S, M (vial of black adder venom)
savingThrow: Reflex half or negates, see text
text: You imbue your blood with corrosive acid. Any time you take piercing or slashing damage, a spray of acidic blood spurts from your body in the direction of the opponent who inflicted the wound, dealing 1d6 points of acid damage per caster level (maximum 15d6, Reflex half). This spurt travels in a 10-foot line, damaging the first creature or object it touches, with no splash damage. After it contacts a creature or object, your acidic blood continues to burn that creature for 1 round, dealing 1d6 points of acid damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 7d6). A second successful Reflex save negates this additional damage.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料(黑蝮蛇毒)
savingThrow_zh: 反射通过则减半 或 无效; 见文本 ;
text_zh: 你将强烈的酸性物质融入血液。每当你受到穿刺或挥砍攻击时，你的伤口就会朝攻击你的敌人喷发出强酸，对被影响的目标造成1d6/施法者等级的强酸伤害（最高15d6，反射豁免减半），这一道酸血可以喷溅的距离为10尺线型，但只对第一个接触到它的生物造成伤害且没有溅射效果。在此之后，强酸会继续烧灼目标1轮，造成1d6/2个施法者的强酸伤害（最高7d6），一个成功的反射检定可以无视此伤害。
